title: An Enemy Among Friends
description: In the summer of 1941, a Japanese teenager arrived in San Francisco to pursue his dream of studying in America. But, on December 7th, his life changed drastically with the attack on Pearl Harbor. This marvelous memoir recalls a time of vanished innocence and endless possibilities, and provides a valuable corrective to a darker and more prevalent view of America at war. Photographs.
author: Kiyoaki Murata
